name: T3 Tris
description:
Camera control:
A / D

Control Pieces:
Arrows

Reset:
R

T3tris is a renewed version of the Arcade Classic.... in 3D!

You will have to deal with the crazy perspective while trying to destroy the level floors.
If you are lucky, you will get the RED VOXEL, which destroys a whole row and column it is located in.
